com.cloudera.oryx.app.common.fn

Class MLFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.app.common.fn.MLFunctions

  • public final class MLFunctions
extends Object
    Contains some reusable functions that are useful for ML-related apps from this project itself, and based on MLlib too.
